name: Deciphering Occult Symbolism
description: Unveiling hidden meanings behind occult symbols, sigils, and rituals used for psychological manipulation.

cards.title: Recognizing Occult Symbols in Everyday Life
cards.description: Learning to spot and understand how hidden symbols shape subconscious narratives.
bulletpoints: Identifying key symbols used in corporate logos, media, and architecture.
Understanding how symbolism influences subconscious behavior.
Decoding occult sigils used in psychological programming.
cards.summaryText: Spot the hidden symbols around you, grasp their subconscious pull, and decode the sigils in play.

cards.title: Breaking the Influence of Ritualistic Symbolism
cards.description: Neutralizing the subconscious effects of symbolic programming.
bulletpoints: Methods for deconditioning the mind from occult psychological triggers.
Understanding how mass rituals create collective energy manipulation.
Techniques for shielding oneself from subliminal symbolic attacks.
cards.summaryText: Decondition occult triggers, understand mass ritual influence, and shield against subliminal assaults.

cards.title: Reclaiming Symbolism for Empowerment
cards.description: Using knowledge of symbolism to break free from occult influence and reclaim mental sovereignty.
bulletpoints: How to rewrite personal symbolic associations to reclaim inner power.
Developing counter-symbolism to neutralize malevolent influence.
Using sacred geometry and archetypes for personal and strategic empowerment.
cards.summaryText: Rewrite symbols for your power, craft counter-sigils, and deploy sacred geometry intentionally.
